name: Hacktastic (Pianta)
description: Hack your way through everything! One hack button not only means you don't need to bring out your java for dummies book just to get around, but it also means you look like a GENIUS! This is a top-down puzzle game, with a neon theme and 8-bit sfx + music. You better have lightning-fast reactions if you want to get into a highly-guarded facility to get the one-and-only quantum computer!
